name: Bannana Bread
author: Sally McKenney
description: This is a recipe for super-moist and buttery, delicious banana bread
ingredients: 1/2 cup (8 Tbsp; 113g) unsalted butter (softened to room temperature)
3/4 cup (150g) packed light or dark brown sugar
2 cups (460g) mashed bananas (about 4 large ripe bananas)
Optional: 3/4 cup (100g) chopped pecans or walnuts
